casebody.data:
ALLSCRIPTS HEALTHCARE, LLC
v.
ETRANSMEDIA TECHNOLOGY, INC. 330A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 7, 2016 W. Swain Wood, Attorney at Law, Shannon R. Joseph, Attorney at Law, John T. Kivus, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Allscripts Healthcare, LLC. Tracie H. Brisson, Attorney at Law, for Etransmedia Technology, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of September 2016 by Plaintiff to File and Maintain Certain Documents from the Record on Appeal Under Seal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of September 2016."
